mapper.select: SELECT id, wallet_id AS walletId, bonus_wallet_id AS bonusWalletId, customer_id AS customerId, group_id AS groupId, bonus_plan_id AS bonusPlanId, status, serial_number AS serialNumber, `type`, expire_date AS expireDate, bank_card_number AS bankCardNumber, bank_name AS bankName, FROM WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( id, wallet_id, bonus_wallet_id, customer_id, group_id, bonus_plan_id, status, serial_number, `type`, expire_date, bank_card_number, bank_name, create_date, creator, create_ip ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{walletId}, #{bonusWalletId}, #{customerId}, #{groupId}, #{bonusPlanId}, #{status}, #{serialNumber}, #{type}, #{expireDate}, #{bankCardNumber}, #{bankName}, NOW(), #{creator}, #{createIp} )
